Summary: pulsating red orbs in a triangle position.
divs: Sighting Detailspulsating red orbs in a triangle position were hovering over our home, making no noise. The orbs would fade in and out of the clouds. I attached 3 pictures to give an idea of the brightness of them. It wasnt a plane because it wasnt moving forward, it just hovered over the house. In all photos you can see the same branch of the tree i was under. These pictures were taken over a 2 hour time period.
